column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Chicago Classic - This has cheese
column2: tomato sauce and sausage.  For being the meat pizza it actually was the one with the least amount of flavor.  The "buttery" crust was a little hard on the bottom and not as crispy on the edges.  Definitely need a knife and fork for this one.  They didn't overdo it on the cheese
column3: which was good and it also wasn't overly saucy.  This of course could be because we took it to go and ate it when it was slightly warm but still.
